existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page website for “Nihal Plasters & Interior Works” with these pages: Home, About Us, Services, Gallery, Contact Us. Each page must be reachable via a persistent header navigation and have a consistent footer with contact details.

Implement a luxury, premium visual design system using a black + gold Islamic-style theme across the entire site (colors, typography, spacing, decorative motifs/pattern accents) while keeping readability and accessibility.

Write and add professional English, SEO-friendly content for all pages/sections: hero headline/subheadline, about copy, services descriptions, testimonials copy, and contact copy tailored to the business offerings (PVC ceiling, gypsum ceiling, POP, wall panels, false ceiling, interior decoration materials shop and contract work).

Create the Home page layout with: premium hero section (CTA buttons for WhatsApp and Call), quick services overview, highlights/USP section, testimonials preview, and a gallery preview leading to the full Gallery page.

Build the Services page with a structured, premium presentation of the six services (PVC Ceiling, Gypsum Ceiling, POP Work, Wall Panels, Interior Design, Material Shop), including benefit-focused bullet points and a CTA to contact via WhatsApp/call.
Implement a Gallery page that displays images with captions and supports a popup/lightbox viewer for browsing images (next/prev, close, keyboard ESC close).

Create a Contact Us page that prominently displays: Owner name (Shaik Nihal Ahmad), Mobile & WhatsApp (7523029086), Phone (9291680966), Email (nmd785621@gmail.com), and Location (Tadepalli, Guntur, Andhra Pradesh), plus a WhatsApp chat button, Call Now button, and an embedded Google Maps view of the location.
Add persistent floating quick-action buttons: WhatsApp chat and Call Now, visible on all pages and optimized for mobile (non-intrusive placement, accessible labels).
Add SEO essentials: per-page title and meta description, semantic landmarks, Open Graph tags, and a basic sitemap/robots setup appropriate for a static business site.
Include a clean, premium logo suggestion for “Nihal Plasters” and render it in the header and footer as a static asset (no backend serving).

Add a new “Request a Change” UI on the Contact page that lets a visitor specify what they want to change on the website (page/section + free-text details) and then opens WhatsApp to +91 7523029086 with a prefilled, URL-encoded message containing the entered information.

Add an additional entry point to the new “Request a Change” flow from the global footer so users can find it from any page (e.g., a “Request a Change” link that navigates to the Contact page and scrolls to the new section, or opens the WhatsApp prefilled message directly).

Update all user-facing branding text and SEO metadata to use the company name “Nihal Plasters & Interior Contractors” (instead of “Nihal Plasters & Interior Works”) across all pages and shared layout components, while keeping the existing luxury black/gold theme and overall site structure.

Update the displayed business address, service area copy, and Google Maps embed on the Contact page and Footer to match: “Sattenapalli Road, Dharani Kota, Indian Gas Front, Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh, India”, and update service-area messaging to clearly state the business serves customers all over India.

Expand the services content and navigation to include the full requested offerings: PVC Ceiling, Gypsum Ceiling, POP Work, Wall Panels, False Ceiling, Interior Decoration, and Material Supply & Contract Work; ensure the Services page, Home services quick-links, and SEO descriptions reflect the expanded list.

Add a luxury-styled Contact Form section on the Contact page that collects (at minimum) visitor name, phone, city, and message/requirements, validates required fields on the client, and on submit opens WhatsApp to +91 7523029086 with a prefilled, URL-encoded message containing the form details (no backend submission). Also align primary CTA labels across the site to include: “Get Free Quote”, “Call Contractor”, and “WhatsApp Now” where appropriate.
